<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cantorian Restoration](/Feats.aspx?ID=2378) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
A living creature within 60 feet would die.

</column>

---

The energy that flows in your blood can save a life in the direst of times. The triggering creature receives the effects of [_breath of life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=29), except they recover a number of Hit Points equal to 6d8 plus your Constitution modifier.
name: Cantorian Restoration
